pr_title: change package name for spring cloud related modules

timeline.message: change package name com.microsoft.azure -> com.azure azure spring cloud

* change package name com.microsoft.azure -> com.azure azure spring cloud
* update checkstyle-suppressions.xml
* update revapi.json

timeline.bodyText: Why is there no 'spring' in the package names for the libraries? I was expecting to see 'com.azure.spring....'
timeline.author: JonathanGiles

replies.bodyText: We are changing the group id to com.azure.spring in another PR. Since this PR only changes a part of our modules, so we will use another PR to change the group id all together. Task tracked by this issue #16148.
replies.author: saragluna

timeline.bodyText: Let's change the package name to com.azure.spring.xxxx
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+/**
+ * Package com.azure.servicebus.stream.binder.properties
+ */
+package com.azure.servicebus.stream.binder.properties;

timeline.bodyText: Why do we suppress this warning?
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -610,4 +610,19 @@
   <!-- Suppress checks in azure-core-experimental -->
   <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.ExternalDependencyExposedCheck"
             files="com.azure.core.experimental.jsonpatch.(JsonPatchDocumentSerializer|JsonPatchOperationSerializer).java"/>
+
+
+  <!-- Suppress checks all azure-spring-cloud MissingJavadocMethod and MissingJavadocType -->
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocMethod" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocType" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="JavadocPackage" files=".*com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*\.java"/>

replies.bodyText: Yes, I will remove the JavadocPackage suppress.
replies.author: ZhuXiaoBing-cn

timeline.bodyText: ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck is suppressed by last line. JavadocThrowsChecks here is for temporary purpose?
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -610,4 +610,19 @@
   <!-- Suppress checks in azure-core-experimental -->
   <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.ExternalDependencyExposedCheck"
             files="com.azure.core.experimental.jsonpatch.(JsonPatchDocumentSerializer|JsonPatchOperationSerializer).java"/>
+
+
+  <!-- Suppress checks all azure-spring-cloud MissingJavadocMethod and MissingJavadocType -->
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocMethod" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocType" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="JavadocPackage" files=".*com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*\.java"/>
+
+  <!-- Suppress checks all azure-spring-cloud -->
+  <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.(GoodLoggingCheck|ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck)" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"></suppress>
+  <suppress checks="com\.azure\.tools\.checkstyle\.checks\.(JavadocThrowsChecks|ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck|ExternalDependencyExposedCheck|EnforceFinalFieldsCheck)"

replies.bodyText: Yes, I will remove the ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck last line again, JavadocThrowsChecks is temporary.
replies.author: ZhuXiaoBing-cn

timeline.bodyText: What's the word that's blacklisted here.
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -610,4 +610,19 @@
   <!-- Suppress checks in azure-core-experimental -->
   <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.ExternalDependencyExposedCheck"
             files="com.azure.core.experimental.jsonpatch.(JsonPatchDocumentSerializer|JsonPatchOperationSerializer).java"/>
+
+
+  <!-- Suppress checks all azure-spring-cloud MissingJavadocMethod and MissingJavadocType -->
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocMethod" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="MissingJavadocType" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="JavadocPackage" files=".*com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*\.java"/>
+
+  <!-- Suppress checks all azure-spring-cloud -->
+  <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.(GoodLoggingCheck|ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck)" files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"></suppress>
+  <suppress checks="com\.azure\.tools\.checkstyle\.checks\.(JavadocThrowsChecks|ThrowFromClientLoggerCheck|ExternalDependencyExposedCheck|EnforceFinalFieldsCheck)"
+            files=".*[/\\]com[/\\]azure[/\\]spring[/\\].*"/>
+  <suppress checks="com.azure.tools.checkstyle.checks.BlacklistedWordsCheck"
